subject: Hello....Easy Access To Your Funds..Stacey.
body:
*Hello....Easy Access To Your Funds..Stacey.*
*Priory Gardens Horfield Bristol United Kingdom BS7-0XE.*
*This is Mr.Mark Wesly.*
*I work as a bank manager/consultant and I am here to rescue you from the
heartless bankers who refuse to release your fund after it has been
approved a long time ago.*
*Waiting.*
*Lesly.*
*For Easy Access, Contact: markwesly19@gmail.com <markwesly19@gmail.com>*

subject: Re: Hello....Easy Access To Your Funds..Stacey.
body:
Hello Lesly,

It's a pleasure to meet you. I'm intrigued by your message and the idea of being rescued from heartless bankers. Could you please elaborate more on this? How exactly does this work? And what kind of fund are we talking about here?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best wishes,
Stacey

subject: The Only Thing To Do..
body:
*Like I said earlier in my message to you, I was sent to this bank, United
bank for Africa (UBA) to audit and in that process I found out that your
fund through your name and decided to inform you on what to do.*
*They abandoned your file/fund due to lack of resources to complete the
process and the people handling your fund process do not know what to do.
Now I have met the foreign currency and exchange fund transfer department
on this issue on how to release and transfer your fund to you, he opened up
to me the secrets that fund beneficiaries/customers in foreign land do not
know and people use the advantage on them.*

*Now this is the secret he revealed to me, due to your fund file having
been abandoned for a long time, it will need a Gift Card like iTunes or
Apple Card of $720 to activate and upgrade the system and the abandoned
dormant account for effective release and transfer of your fund into your
account in the USA. This is the only thing required from you to complete
your fund issues with the bank here and once all is done successfully and
you confirm your fund in your bank account, we will delete your name and
contact information from the bank central system to avoid you receiving any
more messages from scammers around the bank and the world.*

*Get back to me with this arrangement if Ok by you.*
*Mark W.*

subject: Re: The Only Thing To Do..
body:
Hello Mark W.,

Thank you for reaching out and sharing this information with me. It's quite surprising to hear about the situation of my fund file being abandoned. I appreciate your efforts in trying to resolve this issue.

I'm curious about the process you mentioned, particularly the use of a Gift Card or Apple Card to activate and upgrade the system. Could you please explain more about how this works? And why specifically these types of cards are required?

Also, once the account is activated, how long would it take for the funds to be transferred into my account in the USA? 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Stacey

subject: Re: The Only Thing To Do..
body:
First, this gift card are been use to re- register abandoned fund account
with us that has been long without servicing, so it will be use to activate
and upgrade it upto date and once that is done successful, you will receive
your fund into any of your nominated bank account anywhere in the world
within 48hrs banking days.
  If you are in the USA now, it will be easy for you to purchase the needed
cards in any Walmart stores or if you are using Bitcoin, you can send it
through Bitcoin wallet address that will be easy to receive here and
purchase it here immediately.
Get back immediately.
Mark

subject: Re: The Only Thing To Do..
body:
Hello Mark,

Thank you for your message. It's interesting to hear about the use of gift cards in activating and upgrading abandoned fund accounts. I must admit, this is a new concept for me.

Could you please explain a bit more about how this process works? How does purchasing a gift card help in updating an account? And why specifically from Walmart stores?

Also, I'm not very familiar with Bitcoin. Could you tell me more about how it can be used in this context?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best wishes,
Stacey

subject: Re: The Only Thing To Do..
body:
I have explained what should be done and I expect you to follow the
instructions and look forward in making sure everything works according to
planned.
You can buy the gift card anywhere near you, I only mentioned Walmart as it
is where you get them any time.
  I will advise you to follow instructions and less your questions.
If you are purchasing the card now, let me know so as to guide you very
well, like you will scratch the code area very well and send it here.
   But this is midnight there in the USA, so are you awake? Are you in
Facebook?
Mark.

subject: Re: The Only Thing To Do..
body:
Hello Mark,

Thank you for your message. I appreciate your guidance on this matter. I'm not quite sure about the gift card process though, could you explain it a bit more? 

And yes, it is late here in the USA but I'm a night owl so no worries there! As for Facebook, I do have an account but I don't use it very often. Is there a reason you're asking?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Stacey

subject: Re: The Only Thing To Do..
body:
*Like I said, the gift card will be traded online for the use to activate
and upgrade your account with us that will allow free flow of your fund
into your bank account without any hitch from here or your government.*
*I have a facebook and I was thinking we can chat online for easy
communication, this is why i asked.*
*Mark.*

subject: Re: The Only Thing To Do..
body:
Hello Mark,

Thank you for your message. It's interesting to hear about this online trading of gift cards for account activation and upgrades. Could you please explain a bit more about how this process works? 

Also, I'm curious about the free flow of funds into my bank account. How exactly does that work? Is there a specific amount or percentage that gets transferred?

As for Facebook, I do have an account but I prefer to keep our conversation here if that's okay with you.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Stacey

subject: Re: The Only Thing To Do..
body:
*I have explained what I should and I don't have more to explain further,
if you are not willing to continue you can leave it.*

*Mark.*

subject: Re: The Only Thing To Do..
body:
Hello Mark,

Thank you for your message. I understand that you've already explained a lot and I appreciate your patience. I'm just trying to fully grasp the information you've shared. Could you perhaps elaborate on some of the key points? It would be really helpful for me to understand better.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Stacey

subject: Re: The Only Thing To Do..
body:
What else do you want me to elaborate to you, do your part and leave our
part to do.
Get what I told you, I have explained the purpose of the needed Card and
you should get them.
Mark.

subject: Re: The Only Thing To Do..
body:
Hello Mark,

Thank you for your message. I'm trying to understand better, could you please explain more about the purpose of this card? What benefits does it offer?

Best wishes,
Stacey

subject: Re: The Only Thing To Do..
body:
I have told you is for activation and upgrade of smooth transfer of your
funds into your bank account.
Mark.

subject: Re: The Only Thing To Do..
body:
Hello Mark,

Thank you for your message. I'm really interested in this process. Could you please explain a bit more about how the activation and upgrade works? And what kind of funds are we talking about here?

Best wishes,
Stacey

subject: Re: The Only Thing To Do..
body:
This fund is as a result of last coronavirus relief funds to several lucky
people and I believe your name was among and that is why your email was
selected beneficiary to get it.
  Once the card is received, the process will commence.
Mark.

subject: Re: The Only Thing To Do..
body:
Hello Mark,

Wow, that sounds like an amazing opportunity! I'm so lucky to have been selected. Could you please tell me more about this relief fund? How was it established and how are the recipients chosen? Also, could you explain the process that will commence once the card is received?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Stacey

subject: Re: The Only Thing To Do..
body:
I am not the coronavirus UN relief funds committee, my work is to release
and transfer any approved fund from our bank as the approved payee bank.
You ask too much question, I don't like it.
Mark.

subject: Re: The Only Thing To Do..
body:
Hello Mark,

Thank you for your response. I apologize if my questions seem excessive, I'm just trying to understand the process better. Could you please explain a bit more about how the fund release and transfer works? 

Also, could you tell me more about your role in this process? It sounds quite interesting!

Best wishes,
Stacey
